item.title: 3.1.1 LibDQ
item.description: The LibDQ library (as of the moment) has only a few main use cases: Rounding numbers to significant figures (sigfig) Simplifying square roots (simplify_sqrt) Formatting algebraic expressions and equations properly (gen_expr, and gen_eq) Simplifying fractions (gen_frac) Below, I’ll explain the relevant functions that provide the above functionality: sigfig Example Usage simplify_sqrt Example Usage gen_expr Example Usage gen_eq Example Usage gen_frac Example Usage Important: Unfortunately, the below example usage code will only work if you use them inside the QBM.
